data.actual_result: The server switches but there is a Clyde logo in the place of the server text for a few seconds.
data.short_description: Clicking on a server with emojis in the name after a clean restart shows temporarily the Discord Clyde logo when transitioning between servers
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a server that has a Discord generated logo - Go to another channel and then restart Discord - Open the server selector  - Open the server with emotes in the name
